TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You have installed Minecraft.

I wish crafting was realistic in Minecraft.

Granted: Now you never survive the first night.

I wish you could grow apple trees in Minecraft.

Granted. I did it by mods.

I wish Skyrim had realistic resource system.

Granted: It gets turned into a farming game.

I wish the lovely homes I built in older versions of Minecraft didn't get messed up by the new versions.

Granted. No new versions of Minecraft.

 

1 hour ago, ColdJ said:

It gets turned into a farming game.

It was, thanks to the mods. The farming and moonshinery was a nice addition to the usual slavery, head hunting, and other mutilation ones.

But I wished the stones didn't require stone ore, and so on.

(Actually, I wish for a Skyrim: Raubritter balanced modpack.)

Granted: It is balanced on the tip of Mount Everest, you just need to climb up and get it.

I wish for the best hardware, but that it can be run without, software that doesn't let you choose, when , how or if you want to upgrade.
I wish the wish was possible.

Granted, that wish is now is possible, but I'm not granting it. I only grant one wish at a time!

I wish I had lots of cranes.

Granted. But now you need a lot of frogs to feed them.

I wish for quick enlightment.

Granted. A light in your bedroom flickers to life briefly before turning off once again.

I wish for a Kerbal mod that lets you play Kerbal inside Kerbal.

Granted, but every time you try to use it the game crashes.

I wish that a Volvo FMX mod I got for ETS2 didn't cause the game to crash every time I go to the truck in a Volvo dealer.

Granted: It crashes the whole game from the start.

I wish that people you help actually say thank you.

Granted. This is a scripted cutscene.

I wish to script irl cutscenes.

.

Edited June 13, 2022 by Zozaf Kerman

Granted: ,

I wish an apostrophe.

Granted. You are an elf.

I wish magic artifacts could be 3d-printed.

Granted: All you need are bars of platinum and a magic printer.

I wish a brush cutter.

Granted. You bought a paper cutter and started applying it to the brushes.

I wish ffor a small personal universe.

Granted: It is in your head, You can check out any time you like, but you can never leave.

I wish for a game of my design.

Granted: You make it yourself.

I wish for ideas on how to make a EMD F7 A Unit in Lego form.

Granted: You find the Lego factory and build your own out of the thousands of possible pieces.

I wish to go to the lego factory too.

Granted. You lewent to the factory, and now you've legone there.

I wish Skyrim had normal firearms rather those strange bow-looking mod mechanics.

Granted: Now all the characters set themselves on fire and bash each other with their firey arms.

I wish I had gotten to try Skyrim.

Granted. You had, but you didn't hear the air raid sirens.

I wish for my wish to be corrupted.

Granted. You are corrupted, as you wished.

I wish for a human antivirus against human viruses. Especially the cold one.
